content:
We have always believed that we could adhere to our bottom line. In fact, we often exhibit excessive confidence and place too much trust in our humanity. Subsequently, we toy with fire for amusement without ever considering that the real danger may lie ahead.

Therefore, we should generally reflect on our inner selves and observe our minor flaws in humanity. We should then correct our behavior to become more virtuous.

That is the reason why we can remain complete in both soul and body. That is also the reason why we still live as human beings.

### This is my first short post by tinymind
![pic](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1471922694854-ff1b63b20054?q=80&w=2944&auto=format&fit=crop&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D)
